attributes.action: lower the legal age to vote in a general election to 17
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 17 year olds are allowed to drive, allowed to work rather than be in full time education and allowed to have sex, why should they not be allowed to vote for who governs there country for the next 5/7 years in which they will be legaly an adult?

rejection.details: The shortname you have given seems to be different from the petition title 16 - 17. Rejecting so you have the opportunity to change.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
